user_what: React framework for building modern web apps with built-in routing
note: Most popular React framework, works perfectly with Vercel hosting

user_what: Framework for building fast content sites with minimal JavaScript
note: Best for content sites like blogs, marketing pages, and documentation

user_what: Modern framework that compiles to highly efficient JavaScript
note: Easier to learn than React, great for smaller projects

user_what: JavaScript library for building user interfaces with reusable components
note: Industry standard with the largest ecosystem and community

user_what: CSS framework for building custom designs with utility classes
note: Most popular CSS approach, AI coding tools work great with it

user_what: Beautiful React components you copy into your project
note: Not a package—you copy the code directly into your project

user_what: Complete backend with database, authentication, and file storage
note: All-in-one solution: database, auth, storage, and real-time included

user_what: Google's complete backend platform with database and authentication
note: Easiest complete backend, excellent for real-time features

user_what: Backend platform with automatic real-time database updates
note: TypeScript-first with automatic real-time syncing across all clients

user_what: Lightweight framework for building APIs that run anywhere
note: Modern Express alternative, works great on edge platforms

user_what: Build APIs with automatic type safety between frontend and backend
note: TypeScript required, eliminates API typing errors completely

user_what: Content management system with built-in admin interface
note: Choose this if you need content management with custom fields

user_what: Classic Node.js framework for building web servers and APIs
note: Time-tested but requires more manual setup than modern alternatives

user_what: Add real-time multiplayer features like cursors and live updates
note: Specialized for collaborative features like shared cursors and presence

user_what: Serverless Postgres database with instant setup and scaling
note: Modern Postgres with generous free tier and database branching

user_what: SQLite database that runs at the edge for ultra-fast reads
note: Incredibly fast for read-heavy apps, data stored close to users

user_what: Serverless MySQL database with branching workflows
note: Choose this if you need MySQL instead of Postgres

user_what: Cloud database for flexible document-style data storage
note: Best for unstructured data, different approach than SQL databases

user_what: Fast cache and session storage for serverless apps
note: Not your main database—use for caching, sessions, and rate limiting

user_what: Postgres database with built-in full-text search
note: Includes powerful search without needing a separate search service

user_what: Spreadsheet-style database with forms and API access
note: Perfect for MVPs when non-technical team members need database access

user_what: Globally distributed database with GraphQL support
note: More complex than alternatives but offers global distribution

user_what: Simple key-value storage at the edge for fast lookups
note: Only works with Cloudflare Workers, for simple data storage

user_what: Type-safe database toolkit for working with SQL databases
note: Requires a separate database like Neon to store your data

user_what: Lightweight database toolkit with SQL-like TypeScript syntax
note: Requires a separate database, lighter alternative to Prisma

user_what: User authentication with pre-built login and signup components
note: Easiest setup for beginners, includes beautiful pre-built UI

user_what: Authentication library supporting OAuth and passwordless login
note: Free but requires more setup, integrates perfectly with Next.js

user_what: Minimal authentication library with session management
note: Most manual setup, gives you complete control over authentication

user_what: Enterprise authentication platform with advanced features
note: Enterprise-focused with more features but steeper learning curve

user_what: Modern authentication with built-in UI and user management
note: Modern Clerk alternative with competitive pricing

user_what: Payment processing for one-time and subscription payments
note: Industry standard, requires business verification for real payments

user_what: Payment platform that handles all tax and compliance for you
note: They handle all tax compliance, perfect for solo founders

user_what: Payment and billing platform with global tax compliance
note: Similar to Lemon Squeezy, focused on SaaS businesses

user_what: Access GPT language models for text generation and chat
note: Most popular AI API, GPT-4 is powerful but costly

user_what: Claude AI models for text analysis and long document processing
note: Best for detailed analysis and working with long documents

user_what: Run AI models for image generation, video, and audio processing
note: Easiest way to use image generation and open source models

user_what: Platform for running thousands of open source AI models
note: Huge model library but steeper learning curve than alternatives

user_what: Development toolkit for building AI chat interfaces in React
note: Makes streaming AI responses in React incredibly simple

user_what: Vector database for semantic search and AI memory
note: Specialized database for AI semantic search and chatbot memory

user_what: Single API to access multiple AI models from different providers
note: One API for many AI models, easy to switch between providers

user_what: Fast and affordable access to open source AI models
note: Cheapest way to run open source models like Llama

user_what: Convert text to natural-sounding speech in multiple voices
note: Best voice quality available, great for audiobooks and podcasts

user_what: Ultra-fast AI inference for open source language models
note: Fastest inference speeds available, generous free tier

user_what: Connect apps and automate workflows without writing code
note: Most app integrations available, easiest for non-developers

user_what: Visual workflow builder for automating tasks between apps
note: More powerful than Zapier with visual workflow builder

user_what: Open source automation with visual workflows and custom code
note: Self-hostable, good for custom integrations not in Zapier

user_what: Build workflows with code instead of visual builders
note: Developer-focused, write JavaScript workflows instead of clicking

user_what: Run background jobs with automatic retries and scheduling
note: Handles retries and scheduling automatically, built for developers

user_what: TypeScript background jobs with built-in monitoring
note: Great debugging tools, see exactly what your background jobs are doing

user_what: Turn scripts into workflows with visual editor
note: Self-hostable, turn existing scripts into managed workflows

user_what: Deploy web apps with zero configuration and automatic scaling
note: Zero-config deployment, built for Next.js but works with any framework

user_what: Deploy static sites with built-in forms and authentication
note: Great for static sites, includes form handling and simple auth

user_what: Deploy static sites on Cloudflare's global edge network
note: Generous free tier, pairs with Cloudflare Workers for backend

user_what: Deploy full-stack apps with databases in minutes
note: Easiest way to deploy apps with databases included

user_what: Deploy web apps and databases with automatic deployments
note: Similar to Railway, good alternative to Heroku

user_what: Deploy apps globally close to your users
note: Deploy apps at the edge worldwide, more technical than alternatives

user_what: Deploy JavaScript and TypeScript to edge servers instantly
note: Modern JavaScript runtime at the edge, excellent free tier

user_what: Run serverless functions at the edge for ultra-low latency
note: Ultra-fast serverless functions, best for simple API endpoints

user_what: Self-host your own deployment platform on your server
note: Run your own Vercel alternative, requires server management

user_what: Privacy-friendly analytics with simple, easy-to-read dashboard
note: Privacy-first, no cookies needed, very easy to understand

user_what: Product analytics with event tracking and feature flags
note: All-in-one product analytics with generous free tier

user_what: Track user actions and analyze behavior funnels
note: Powerful event tracking, more complex than simpler alternatives

user_what: Free website analytics from Google for tracking visitors
note: Free but complex interface, privacy concerns in some regions

user_what: Open source privacy-focused analytics you can self-host
note: Self-hostable for free, simpler than Google Analytics

user_what: Privacy-friendly analytics focused on site performance
note: Dead simple if you're already deploying on Vercel

user_what: Simple privacy-focused analytics with GDPR compliance
note: Premium Plausible alternative with better customer support

user_what: Free privacy-focused analytics from Cloudflare
note: Completely free, works even without Cloudflare hosting

user_what: Store and collaborate on code with version control
note: Industry standard for code storage and team collaboration

user_what: Code in your browser with AI assistance and instant deployment
note: Code and deploy from browser, good for quick prototypes

user_what: Generate React UI components from text descriptions
note: Vercel's AI that generates shadcn/ui components from descriptions

user_what: AI that builds complete applications from descriptions
note: StackBlitz AI that builds entire working apps, great for MVPs

user_what: Track and fix errors in your production apps
note: Essential for production, shows exactly where errors happen

user_what: Record user sessions to see exactly what went wrong
note: Watch video of exactly what users did before errors occurred

user_what: Open source session replay and error monitoring
note: Open source LogRocket alternative with generous free tier

user_what: Store and optimize images and videos with automatic delivery
note: Complete media solution with automatic optimization and transformations

user_what: Simple file upload solution for Next.js applications
note: Dead simple file uploads for Next.js with full type safety

user_what: Fast file storage integrated with Vercel hosting
note: Simple object storage if you're already deploying on Vercel

user_what: Image optimization and delivery with real-time transformations
note: Image-focused with automatic optimization and on-the-fly transformations

user_what: Professional video hosting with built-in player and analytics
note: Complete video solution with player, analytics, and delivery

user_what: Send transactional emails through a developer-friendly API
note: Modern SendGrid alternative built specifically for developers

note: Established provider handling both transactional and marketing
